text: The men's 110 metres hurdles event at the 2007 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Debrecen, Hungary, at Gyulai István Atlétikai Stadion on 13 and 14 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Konstadinos Douvalidis ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Adrien Deghelt ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Emanuele Abate ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 14 July Wind: -0.4m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !!
